list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add comprehensive updates for file management, serialization, data handling, and Docker integration.
- Replace `list-cdc.php` API with Symfony `/api/specifications` endpoint and integrate serialization for SpecificationBook entities. - Refactor frontend specification list to dynamically load from the updated API. - Add `FileFixtures` and `SpecificationBookFixtures` for improved data seeding. - Introduce `SerializerContextBuilder` for enhanced circular reference handling. - Unify `Dockerfile` setup for Nuxt and Symfony services and adjust Docker Compose configuration. - Enhance `.htaccess` for API-specific route handling and file exclusions. - Update `.gitignore` to reflect new directory structures and ignore `vendor` in Docker build context.

task.summary: Enhance token handling with `jwt-decode` integration. Add token expiration check, automatic logout on expiration, and token timer functionality.

Integrate device fingerprinting for enhanced admin authentication. Add `@fingerprintjs/fingerprintjs` dependency, create utility for fingerprint retrieval, and update login process with fingerprint validation. Adjust related API and UI components.

Update specifications form field types and improve legal compliance handling. Adjust text inputs to textareas for detailed responses, add legal/CMS preferences field, and refine conditions générales de vente with updated deposit requirement. Enhance CORS handling in APIs and refactor admin login code for clarity.
Update FormAdminLogin API endpoint to production URL.
Update FormAdminLogin API endpoint to production URL.

Add `CdcList` component and file management system for specifications.
- Create `CdcList` component for managing cahier des charges with Vue 3 composition API. - Add file upload functionality with validation in `FileUploadForm`. - Implement backend APIs: `list-cdc.php` for listing and `upload-cdc.php` for file uploads. - Update dashboard to display `CdcList` and streamline navigation. - Update `.gitignore` to exclude uploaded files.

Initialize Symfony API project with essential configurations, Mail and Auth controllers, Docker setup, and database integration.
- Add Symfony base structure with `MailController` and `AuthController`. - Configure Doctrine ORM, migrations, and database connection. - Setup Docker environment for Symfony, MySQL, and Nuxt.js. - Add testing scaffold with PHPUnit. - Include `.editorconfig` and `.gitignore` for consistent development standards.

Add entities and repositories for managing services, locations, categories, and related fixtures.
- Introduced `Service`, `Location`, `Category`, `MicroService`, `ServicePrice`, and `ServicePriceInclude` entities with corresponding repositories. - Implemented data fixtures for populating initial data for the above entities. - Refactored existing entities with new fields and relationships.

Add JWT and CORS integration to the Symfony API.
- Configure `LexikJWTAuthenticationBundle` for token-based authentication. - Add `NelmioCorsBundle` for handling Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) headers. - Update `AuthController` to authenticate users with password and fingerprint verification. - Refactor API login logic and endpoint. - Update `.gitignore` to exclude JWT key files.

Enable API route prefixing, rewrite configuration, and adjust admin login endpoint.
- Add `.htaccess` for handling route rewriting to `index.php`. - Update `routes.yaml` to include `/api` prefix for all API routes. - Modify `FormAdminLogin` to use updated `/api/auth` endpoint. - Enable `mod_rewrite` and configure `.htaccess` usage in Symfony Docker setup.

Add entities and repositories for `Client`, `Quote`, `File`, and `SpecificationBook`, along with related data fixtures and a migration.
- Introduced `Client`, `Quote`, `File`, and `SpecificationBook` entities with relationships and corresponding repositories. - Created fixtures for `User` and `Specifications`. - Added a migration to support the new database schema.

Add comprehensive data fixtures for `ServicePriceInclude` and `Specifications`.
- Populate concrete service price inclusion data for various categories of services. - Introduce detailed specifications with fields covering personalization, project objectives, design preferences, and more. - Implement dependencies on existing fixtures for consistency and relational integrity. - Update repository references and align fixture logic with defined entities.
Add `upload_directory` parameter and ignore uploaded files in .gitignore.

Add comprehensive updates for file management, serialization, data handling, and Docker integration.
- Replace `list-cdc.php` API with Symfony `/api/specifications` endpoint and integrate serialization for SpecificationBook entities. - Refactor frontend specification list to dynamically load from the updated API. - Add `FileFixtures` and `SpecificationBookFixtures` for improved data seeding. - Introduce `SerializerContextBuilder` for enhanced circular reference handling. - Unify `Dockerfile` setup for Nuxt and Symfony services and adjust Docker Compose configuration. - Enhance `.htaccess` for API-specific route handling and file exclusions. - Update `.gitignore` to reflect new directory structures and ignore `vendor` in Docker build context.

MESSAGE.value:
Add lazy loading for images in SectionService & SectionAbout
Improve performance by introducing `loading="lazy"` to image elements. This reduces initial load time and enhances user experience by deferring image loading until they are visible in the viewport.

Refactor "Services" dropdown menu with dynamic data and transitions
Replaced hardcoded links with dynamic rendering using a subServices array. Added a toggle-based menu with improved accessibility and smooth transition animations. Code is now cleaner, more reusable, and enhances user experience.

Enhance mobile menu with transitions and improved UI.
Added enter and leave transitions for smoother animations. Improved the mobile menu layout, including better spacing, styling, and hover effects. Refactored the structure to use a loop for sub-services for better maintainability.

Remove outdated CGU content, logo resources, and refactor services.
Deleted unused CGU markdown content and outdated logo files to clean up unused resources. Updated service structure with improved TypeScript definitions and imports for better type safety and organization. Restored streamlined Nuxt config settings for consistency.

Add typing animation to MainTitle and integrate in SectionHero
Introduce a dynamic typing animation in the `MainTitle` component, displaying a rotating text effect. Integrate this new component into `SectionHero` to enhance the visual and interactive engagement of the hero section. Minor style adjustments included for better alignment.
Add DynamicForm component for user inputs and admin integration, with specifications data.

Replace DynamicForm with FormSpecification for streamlined handling of specifications. Update dependent logic, enhance PDF generation using jsPDF and jsPDF-Autotable, adjust required fields in specifications, and improve user experience. Add logo asset and dependencies.
Add FormAdminLogin for admin authentication and create admin dashboard structure with dynamic menu integration. Enhance PDF generation in FormSpecification with updated footer text.
Add admin authentication with JWT and token-based middleware. Refactor FormAdminLogin and update related components for secure authentication. Disable SSR and adjust API calls for local endpoints.
Integrate jwt-decode for token management, enhance user store with token expiration handling, and update FormAdminLogin API call to use local endpoint.
Implement token expiry handling with `jwt-decode`, add auto-logout and token cleanup logic. Update user store and dependencies.
Enhance token handling with `jwt-decode` integration. Add token expiration check, automatic logout on expiration, and token timer functionality.

Integrate device fingerprinting for enhanced admin authentication. Add `@fingerprintjs/fingerprintjs` dependency, create utility for fingerprint retrieval, and update login process with fingerprint validation. Adjust related API and UI components.

Update specifications form field types and improve legal compliance handling. Adjust text inputs to textareas for detailed responses, add legal/CMS preferences field, and refine conditions générales de vente with updated deposit requirement. Enhance CORS handling in APIs and refactor admin login code for clarity.
Update FormAdminLogin API endpoint to production URL.

Add `CdcList` component and file management system for specifications.
- Create `CdcList` component for managing cahier des charges with Vue 3 composition API. - Add file upload functionality with validation in `FileUploadForm`. - Implement backend APIs: `list-cdc.php` for listing and `upload-cdc.php` for file uploads. - Update dashboard to display `CdcList` and streamline navigation. - Update `.gitignore` to exclude uploaded files.

Initialize Symfony API project with essential configurations, Mail and Auth controllers, Docker setup, and database integration.
- Add Symfony base structure with `MailController` and `AuthController`. - Configure Doctrine ORM, migrations, and database connection. - Setup Docker environment for Symfony, MySQL, and Nuxt.js. - Add testing scaffold with PHPUnit. - Include `.editorconfig` and `.gitignore` for consistent development standards.

Add entities and repositories for managing services, locations, categories, and related fixtures.
- Introduced `Service`, `Location`, `Category`, `MicroService`, `ServicePrice`, and `ServicePriceInclude` entities with corresponding repositories. - Implemented data fixtures for populating initial data for the above entities. - Refactored existing entities with new fields and relationships.

Integrate JWT authentication and enhance CORS support.
- Add `LexikJWTAuthenticationBundle` and `NelmioCorsBundle` for secure authentication and cross-origin requests. - Update `AuthController` to generate JWT tokens upon login with password and fingerprint validation. - Update `FormAdminLogin` to use production API URL and fix fingerprint variable naming. - Update configuration files for JWT and CORS settings. - Extend `.gitignore` to exclude JWT keys.

Add JWT and CORS integration to the Symfony API.
- Configure `LexikJWTAuthenticationBundle` for token-based authentication. - Add `NelmioCorsBundle` for handling Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) headers. - Update `AuthController` to authenticate users with password and fingerprint verification. - Refactor API login logic and endpoint. - Update `.gitignore` to exclude JWT key files.

Enable API route prefixing, rewrite configuration, and adjust admin login endpoint.
- Add `.htaccess` for handling route rewriting to `index.php`. - Update `routes.yaml` to include `/api` prefix for all API routes. - Modify `FormAdminLogin` to use updated `/api/auth` endpoint. - Enable `mod_rewrite` and configure `.htaccess` usage in Symfony Docker setup.

Add entities and repositories for `Client`, `Quote`, `File`, and `SpecificationBook`, along with related data fixtures and a migration.
- Introduced `Client`, `Quote`, `File`, and `SpecificationBook` entities with relationships and corresponding repositories. - Created fixtures for `User` and `Specifications`. - Added a migration to support the new database schema.

Add comprehensive data fixtures for `ServicePriceInclude` and `Specifications`.
- Populate concrete service price inclusion data for various categories of services. - Introduce detailed specifications with fields covering personalization, project objectives, design preferences, and more. - Implement dependencies on existing fixtures for consistency and relational integrity. - Update repository references and align fixture logic with defined entities.
Add `upload_directory` parameter and ignore uploaded files in .gitignore.

Add comprehensive updates for file management, serialization, data handling, and Docker integration.
- Replace `list-cdc.php` API with Symfony `/api/specifications` endpoint and integrate serialization for SpecificationBook entities. - Refactor frontend specification list to dynamically load from the updated API. - Add `FileFixtures` and `SpecificationBookFixtures` for improved data seeding. - Introduce `SerializerContextBuilder` for enhanced circular reference handling. - Unify `Dockerfile` setup for Nuxt and Symfony services and adjust Docker Compose configuration. - Enhance `.htaccess` for API-specific route handling and file exclusions. - Update `.gitignore` to reflect new directory structures and ignore `vendor` in Docker build context.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Add comprehensive updates for file management, serialization, data handling, and Docker integration.
- Replace `list-cdc.php` API with Symfony `/api/specifications` endpoint and integrate serialization for SpecificationBook entities. - Refactor frontend specification list to dynamically load from the updated API. - Add `FileFixtures` and `SpecificationBookFixtures` for improved data seeding. - Introduce `SerializerContextBuilder` for enhanced circular reference handling. - Unify `Dockerfile` setup for Nuxt and Symfony services and adjust Docker Compose configuration. - Enhance `.htaccess` for API-specific route handling and file exclusions. - Update `.gitignore` to reflect new directory structures and ignore `vendor` in Docker build context.
